channel.title: Everytime i press play i get this error pop up?
channel.description:
i have the server running on my ip and everything running on the right jdk update but cant work out how to sort this problem. if you havent got a helful input dont even bother.. thanks
when i click edit i get this what should be there?
@echo off start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
find attached//

item.title: Everytime i press play i get this error pop up?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:4, topic:377850”]1. This isn’t the client section.

You need to set your environmental variables. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oowsJcJLmss

In response to Newty, you could just use the file directory if you cba to do the environmental variables.[/quote]

Or do it properly instead so you don’t have to add a long directory name in every batch file that uses java.

Read full topic
item.source: Everytime i press play i get this error pop up?
